name: Auto Slayer
description:
Adventure through a procedurally generated map of encounters and assemble a team that will fight for you, progressing through up to 3 Acts!

Gameplay:

  • Buy units
    • 3 of the same unit will level it up
  • Refresh the store for a new set of units for gold
  • Sell the units by dragging them ontop of the store
  • Place units around the grid for a favorable position
  • Gain experience for each encounter
  • Use gold to level up faster to have more units in play

Controls

  • Left click does just about everything you need
  • S to sell (Hovering over a unit)
  • R to refresh the store

Notes:

  • Unfinished
  • Saving/Loading is non-functioning
  • Press Esc for some debug options
    • Clicking "I am speed" will play the game at a much faster rate
  • Act 3 is most likely impossible to beat
